com.google.enterprise.connector.util.filter
Interface DocumentFilterFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDocumentFilter, AddPropertyFilter, CopyPropertyFilter, DeletePropertyFilter, DocumentFilterChain, ModifyPropertyFilter, MovePropertyFilter, SkipDocumentFilter
public interface DocumentFilterFactory

An interface for factories that create Document filters. Document filter acts to transform the information retrieved from its source document. Typically document filters would add, remove, or modify a Document's Properties, including the document content. A document filter might even throw SkippedDocumentException to prevent a document from being fed to the GSA.

Multiple document filters may be chained together, forming a transformational document processing pipeline.

See Also:
DocumentFilterChain

Method Summary
 Document newDocumentFilter(Document source)
          Returns a new Document that acts as a filter for the supplied source Document.
 

Method Detail

newDocumentFilter

Parameters:

Returns:
a document filter
